mapper.select: select * from h_score_record where scorerecordzzid > #{start} order by scorerecordzzid limit 10000
mapper.insert:
insert into h_score_record2 ( scorerecordid, tenantid, productid, regionid, communityid, tenantgroupid, wybz, bgjf, jfly, ljlx, yhlx, bglx, sfjfdh, companyid, flmx, glbm, glid, bgms, ddlsh, createuser, createtime, active, scorerecordzzid, qy_projectid ) values
( #{item.scorerecordid}, #{item.tenantid}, #{item.productid}, #{item.regionid}, #{item.communityid}, #{item.tenantgroupid}, #{item.wybz}, #{item.bgjf}, #{item.jfly}, #{item.ljlx}, #{item.yhlx}, #{item.bglx}, #{item.sfjfdh}, #{item.companyid}, #{item.flmx}, #{item.glbm}, #{item.glid}, #{item.bgms}, #{item.ddlsh}, #{item.createuser}, #{item.createtime}, #{item.active}, #{item.scorerecordzzid}, #{item.qy_projectid} )
